## Validate.toQualifierName() function

Converts a string to a [QualifierName](./ts-res.qualifiername.md) if it is a valid qualifier name.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function toQualifierName(name: string): Result<QualifierName>;
```

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[QualifierName](./ts-res.qualifiername.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the converted [QualifierName](./ts-res.qualifiername.md) if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
